user.title: Kitchen Cooking Engine
user.description: Set up the Kitchen Cooking Engine integration to monitor cooking with any temperature sensor.

data_description.temperature_sensor: Select the temperature sensor to use for cooking (e.g., MEATER probe tip temperature)
data_description.ambient_sensor: Optional ambient temperature sensor for better ETA predictions (e.g., MEATER ambient)
data_description.battery_sensor: Optional battery level sensor (e.g., MEATER battery percentage)
data_description.indicator_light: Optional RGB light that changes color from blue (cold) to red (target) during cooking
data_description.notify_service: Find in Developer Tools → Actions → search 'notify.mobile_app'. Enter the part after 'notify.' (e.g., mobile_app_johns_iphone)
data_description.temperature_unit: Choose Celsius or Fahrenheit for display

error.sensor_not_found: The selected sensor was not found.

abort.already_configured: This sensor is already configured for cooking.
